name: Boohloween
description:
Both players  must be on the same network.

One player must go in the create menu and  hit the create button.

The other players, in the join menu, must refresh the room list, open the dropwon and select corresponding room before hitting the Join Button.

The room creator can hit the Start button  to launch the game once all players are ready

Control with arrows, don't fall and kick other out ! Everyone has 3 lives, spend them well !
